page.title: 08A day out
page.content: Where do people in this area go for a day out at the weekend ? {Stratford Upon Avon,}the birthplace of William Shakespeare and home to the Royal Shakespeare Company, is within 25 miles and is a popular place for day trips. As well as its cultural side, Stratford is well equipped for tourists with its boat rides and children's play areas. The nearest popular seaside resort is{Weston-Super-Mare}which is easily reached by motorway within two hours. Many families enjoy a day in the {Forest of Dean}which covers many square miles of Gloucestershire. Here it is possible to go on Forestry Commission guided tours to see the coal mines, iron ore deposits and pennant sandstone quarrying.
